title: Does God's sign share with Khamenei a picture of him reading "fire and anger "?
subtitle: It is clear that a picture shows Iran Andbos; the Supreme Leader reads Michael Wolf Andbos; and the controversial book about United States President Donald Trump is one true.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A Ayatollah Ali Khamenei shared a picture of him reading Michael Wolfe's book "Fire and Anger."
